|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5

==Overview== "2976528502" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The hardware design is identical to the [[Netgear EX6150v2]] which is AC1200. One of the 5GHz front-end modules is missing in the FCC photos so 802.11ac from the IPQ4018 is probably limited to single-stream speeds in this EX6100v2. The 5GHz FEM, FLA1, and switch IDs are taken from the EX6150v2 FCC images and assumed to be the same.
DFS was added in a Class II Permissive Change on 10/17/2017
Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_ex6100_v2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = AP-Extender toggle-switch |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
